meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasing or agreeable.
meanings.sent1: The pleasingness of the music filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent2: I was drawn to the pleasingness of the colorful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The pleasingness of the cake made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a pleasingness that was like a gentle breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The pleasingness of the sunset was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being pleasing to the senses or mind.
meanings.sent1: The pleasingness of the soft fabric against my skin was comforting.
meanings.sent2: The pleasingness of the painting brought a sense of calm to the room.
meanings.sent3: The pleasingness of the joke made us all laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: The pleasingness of the aroma from the bakery made my mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The pleasingness of the book's ending left me feeling content.
